---
title: "api.ts"
---

## High-level description
This code defines the interface for the CommonWell Management API, which is used to interact with CommonWell Health Alliance services. It includes types and methods for retrieving and updating member information and include lists.

## Symbols

### `Member`
#### Description
A type representing a member in the CommonWell system.

#### Inputs
| Name | Type | Description |
|:-----|:-----|:------------|
| id | string | The unique identifier for the member |
| name | string | The name of the member |

### `CommonWellManagementAPI`
#### Description
An interface defining the methods available for interacting with the CommonWell Management API.

#### Methods

### `getBaseUrl()`
#### Description
Retrieves the base URL for the CommonWell Management API.

#### Outputs
| Name | Type | Description |
|:-----|:-----|:------------|
| baseUrl | string | The base URL for the API |

### `getMember()`
#### Description
Retrieves information about a member.

#### Inputs
| Name | Type | Description |
|:-----|:-----|:------------|
| params | object | Optional parameters for the request |
| params.timeout | number | Optional timeout for the request |
| params.log | function | Optional logging function |

#### Outputs
| Name | Type | Description |
|:-----|:-----|:------------|
| member | Member \| undefined | The retrieved member information or undefined if not found |

### `getIncludeList()`
#### Description
Retrieves the include list for a specific organization.

#### Inputs
| Name | Type | Description |
|:-----|:-----|:------------|
| params | object | Parameters for the request |
| params.oid | string | The organization identifier |
| params.timeout | number | Optional timeout for the request |
| params.log | function | Optional logging function |

#### Outputs
| Name | Type | Description |
|:-----|:-----|:------------|
| includeList | string[] | An array of included organization identifiers |

### `updateIncludeList()`
#### Description
Updates the include list for a specific organization.

#### Inputs
| Name | Type | Description |
|:-----|:-----|:------------|
| params | object | Parameters for the request |
| params.oid | string | The organization identifier |
| params.careQualityOrgIds | string[] | Array of CareQuality organization IDs to include |
| params.timeout | number | Optional timeout for the request |
| params.log | function | Optional logging function |
| params.debug | function | Optional debug logging function |

#### Outputs
| Name | Type | Description |
|:-----|:-----|:------------|
| - | Promise&lt;void&gt; | A promise that resolves when the update is complete |

## Dependencies
| Dependency | Purpose |
|:-----------|:--------|
| dayjs | Date and time manipulation library |
| dayjs/plugin/duration | Plugin for duration calculations in dayjs |

Note: The `dayjs.extend(duration)` call suggests that the duration plugin is being used, although it's not directly utilized in the provided code snippet.

This interface provides a structured way to interact with the CommonWell Management API, allowing for operations such as retrieving member information, getting and updating include lists for organizations. The methods include optional parameters for timeout and logging, which can be useful for debugging and performance monitoring.
